item.title: National Nanny Playdate 2017 In Review
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: The current treasurer of the NC PAN board went out to Greensboro to visit the nannies out there for National Nanny Playdate 2017 in August. The Greensboro playdate was sponsored by one of the NC PAN agency affiliates, Nanny By Design. Here is a raw, unedited peek inside of the National Nanny Playdate Greensboro for […]
item.content:encoded:
The current treasurer of the NC PAN board went out to Greensboro to visit the nannies out there for National Nanny Playdate 2017 in August. The Greensboro playdate was sponsored by one of the NC PAN agency affiliates, Nanny By Design.

Here is a raw, unedited peek inside of the National Nanny Playdate Greensboro for 2017.

Nanny By Design made it enticing to come! They had swag give aways for everyone who attended of a can coozie.

If this looks like loads of fun, please make sure that you are an NC PAN member or a Friend of NC PAN and keep an eye on our calendar. We’ll be posting all the National Nanny Playdates for 2018 that we hear about.

If you are an agency and this looks like something you are willing to produce or sponsor, make sure you are an agency affiliate so that you can hear of locations who need sponsors or can more easily tell us of your plans for National Nanny Playdate 2018.
